thread.title: Antony Barnes

author: Antony Barnes
title: Antony Barnes
text:
First time I've used this service. Very easy to use and booked a Sunday fitting. Received e-mail on the morning with a 2 hour time slot then had call from technician Jonathan C explaining that he could be there an hour earlier.
The work was carried out very efficiently to a very high standard, brake pads and discs were also checked with before and after shots taken of the vehicle to ensure no damages caused.
An excellent service, will use again and would definitely recommend to others.
